entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
